WorkItem.Description:
Please add the data Scrambling/Masking code samples because I have not seen any libraries or code samples to cover the data scrambling or masking (not to mix with Obfuscating data which is more about hiding the content) so far any where.
This is often required to allow realistic testing off a subset of data from production systems by software testers or developers who do not necessarily have the privilege to see the "live" data.
